text: York Against Cancer is a cancer research association based in York, England and founded in 1987. The charity commissioned a £700,000 mobile chemotherapy unit to serve patients of the York Teaching Hospital NHS Foundation Trust and which, when launched in July 2017, was the first of its kind in Yorkshire. ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Cancer organisations based in the United Kingdom Category:Health charities in England Category:Organisations based in York Category:Organizations established in 1987 Category:1987 establishments in England
title: York Against Cancer
